import React, { useState } from 'react' import './formstyle.css' import Hint from 'react-portal-hint' export const HappyForm = props => { const [message, setMessage] = useState('') const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() props.onFormSubmit(message) setMessage('') } return (

SHARING IS CARING:

{message.length}/140

) }
